message: One that came up was django-lean, though it has a lot dependencies (including South which I don't use).
A few others to consider?  https://github.com/johnboxall/django-ab and https://github.com/gregdingle/genetify
I wrote django-gwo for google website optimizer: https://github.com/washingtontimes/django-gwo

I wrote Splango which can do multivariate testing at the template or python level: https://github.com/shimon/Splango ... pretty simple implementation, and I'd be happy to hear what areas need improvement.
